title: Angry Birds Classic is back on the App Store with a new engine and no in-app purchases
content:
Angry Birds is certainly one of the most popular mobile games of all time, with different versions introduced since 2009. Rovio, the company behind the game, is now bringing the original Angry Birds game back to the App Store with a new engine and no in-app purchases.

moreâ€¦

The post Angry Birds Classic is back on the App Store with a new engine and no in-app purchases appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Angry Birds Classic, one of the most popular mobile games of all time, is now back on the App Store with a new engine.
